name: Sun in the middle of Daylight
description:
It's nearly the end of 2014 when i took this photograph. Life's screwed, academic were hanging, friends gone too. I didn't have enough belief to continue the life journey. At those low life-phase, i often stared at the sun in the middle of daylight.

Seeing the sun often made me realize that life's been tough for many people. I imagined how Jakartans were going thru' routine's life. Imagined how hard it was for some daily workers going thru' busy day, hating the sunlight because it's really hot it could burn their skin.

But there were no options for them. Many people can only surrender to keep on living. (div)
